import {useState} from "react" import './style.css' function App() { const [newItem, setNewItem] = useState("") const [todos, setTodos] = useState([]) function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() setTodos([...todos, {id: crypto.randomUUID}]) } return ( <>
setNewItem(e.target.value) } type="text" id="item" />

To-do List

); } export default App;
